com.samskivert.io

Class ExtensiblePrintStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.PrintStream
          • com.samskivert.io.ExtensiblePrintStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public abstract class ExtensiblePrintStream
extends PrintStream
    Wraps a supplied PrintStream to allow capturing all data written to the stream via the various print() and println() variants. Derived classes must implement the handlePrinted(java.lang.String) and handleNewLine() methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExtensiblePrintStream(PrintStream out)
      Constructs an extensible print stream.
      ExtensiblePrintStream(PrintStream out, boolean autoFlush)
      Constructs an extensible print stream.

      Constructs an extensible print stream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void handleNewLine()
      Called whenever a newline is printed to the stream by one of the various println() methods.
      abstract void handlePrinted(String s)
      Called with any text printed to the stream, excepting newlines resulting from calls to the various println() methods, which are reported via handleNewLine().
      void print(boolean b) 
      void print(char c) 
      void print(char[] s) 
      void print(double d)

      void println(Object x) 
      void println(String x)
